name: EurekaSmartLiving
0:
”Alexa, turn on living room lamp”
”Alexa, dim spot light to thirty percent”
”Alexa, set AC to twenty one degrees”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Eureka Smart Living skill and Alexa, allows you to control your ESL smart home devices and scenes. To get started, select the "Enable Skill" button in the Alexa App to link your ESL account and say, "Alexa, discover devices”.
Using simple and intuitive voice commands you can activate smart home scenes and control smart devices.
The Eureka Smart Living Smart Home Skill supports the full set of Alexa voice commands for controlling lights, thermostats, multimedia devices, and scenes. Simply say “Alexa, turn on relax mode” to activate the scene that you have set up for going relaxing, “Alexa, turn on bedtime” to set the perfect lighting for good night sleep, or adjust a thermostat quickly and easily by saying “Alexa, set bedroom temperature to 72 degrees”.
